status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"fibcu","text":"Prepare a Falcon tube with  base cortical media plus Rock inhibitor (Ri, 1:1000
dilution)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4toom","text":"Wash cells with   PBS -/- (gently run PBS down the side of each well)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1oiav","text":"Incubate cells in   Accutase (per well) at   to lift cells off wells in small
clumps","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4irdv","text":"         - Monitor the Accutase incubation after  ; tap the plate to dislodge cells and look for cells lifting in a sheet before proceeding","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2a4mo","text":"        - Triturate 5 times to break the cells into clumps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rqrd","text":"        - Incubate clumps for a further   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"br8bo","text":"        - Triturate 10 times to break the cells into single cells and small clumps ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tmo7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6poja","text":"4. Transfer cells from the wells into the 15ml Falcon tube containing media + Ri (Step 1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee89j","text":"5. Rinse with plate with a further   of Accutase to ensure all cells are collected","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":7,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"54tcm","text":"6. Spin cells at  ,   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":8,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":9,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":10,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ak5om","text":"7. Discard supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dclo1","text":"8. Resuspend cell pellet in 1-2ml base cortical media and add Ri (1:1000)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f66jt","text":"9. Count cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl367","text":"       - Take 2 x  aliquot of cells in two separate tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":11,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"evmje","text":"Dilute cells 1:1 using   of trypan blue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":12,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"elm9q","text":"       - Count cells in a   aliquot from each tube using a haemocytometer ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":13,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"35ne3","text":"       - Calculate total number of cells (Total cells = Average count of quadrants x Dilution factor x Volume (ml) x 10^4)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9ot0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c330d","text":"10.  Calculate the total volume needed to resuspend cells to a final density of 100 000/uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k3p1","text":"11.  Spin cells at  ,   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":14,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":15,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":16,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"gkjj","text":"12.  Whilst cells are spinning, make up   media + Ri which will be used to resuspend the
cells for implantation surgery","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":17,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2o3b7","text":"13.  At end of the spin, collect tube and discard supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4294o","text":"14.  Using a P20, add   and resuspend pellet in base cortical media + Ri","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":18,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"hlla","text":"15.  Transfer resuspended pellet to PCR tube and precisely measure the volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d7i5","text":"16.  Add the remaining volume needed for cells to reach a density of 100 000 cells/ul as
calculated in step 10.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78hrb","text":"17.  Label the PCR tube containing the cells with details of the cell line and concentration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cluv0","text":"18.  Store cells on ice and transport to animal surgical room.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee293","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"10":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"11":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"12":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"13":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"14":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"15":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"16":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"17":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"18":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"5":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"6":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"7":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"8":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"9":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9b5av","text":"Athymic mice undergo stereotactic surgery to receive a unilateral graft of 100,000
cortical progenitors in   volume. The surgical coordinates from Bregma are AP: +1, ML: +/-1.5, DV: -1.5","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b5406","text":"
For full details of procedures for implantation of cell suspension can be found at https://www.protocols.io/view/transplantation-of-fetal-midbrain-dopamine-progeni-261ge4jq7v47/v1
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":84,"length":96}],"data":{}},{"key":"7rmv3","text":"
